title: Alexander McQueen
summary: Lee Alexander McQueen, CBE (17 March 1969 â€“ 11 February 2010) was an English fashion designer and couturier.[2] He founded his own Alexander McQueen label in 1992, and was chief designer at Givenchy from 1996 to 2001.[2] His achievements in fashion earned him four British Designer of the Year awards (1996, 1997, 2001 and 2003), as well as the CFDA's International Designer of the Year award in 2003.[2]
